## `SetSummaryStatsDolchReportOptions`

Sets which results in the Dolch summary report should be included for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetSummaryStatsDolchReportOptions(boolean includeCoverage,
                                  boolean includeWords,
                                  boolean includeExplanation)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` includeCoverage | `true` to include the Dolch coverage statistics. | 
| `boolean` includeWords | `true` to include the Dolch word statistics. | 
| `boolean` includeExplanation | `true` to include an explanation about the results. |
:::
